EmailTemplate.description: To send to client when case is closed, now under Cust Surveys Updated May 2016
EmailTemplate.name: Issue Resolution Email Template May 2016
EmailTemplate.subject: Tell Us What You Think In 2 Minutes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
At Yodle, we are passionate about your success and are committed to continually improving the service we provide you.
If you have a moment, we’d be grateful if you could answer a few questions about your experience with our Customer Success Team, so that we can continue to improve the Yodle experience for you and all of the businesses we support.
Please respond as soon as possible – it should only take a couple of minutes, and the survey link will expire in one week.
Click the link below to take a survey about your recent request.
http://survey.clicktools.com/app/survey/go.jsp?iv=384s303ospr8d&q1={!Account.Id}&q2={!Case.Id}&q3={!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Sincerely,
Kent Warren Vice President, Client Services
©{!User.Today_s_Year__c} by Yodle Web.com, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
